articles.author: John Laurenson
articles.title: The decline of the French bistro - BBC
articles.description: In France, traditional restaurants are disappearing – the French blame high costs and the "Americanisation" of eating habits.
articles.content: For Moureaud, things are a bit worse than that. "Nowadays, I feel like I'm working for nothing," he says. "Once I've managed to pay my staff, pay my suppliers, and pay all the obligatory charges, tax… [+1026 chars]
